column5: Wow guys, Just got off the water and all I can say is I have never caught fish like that in my life..........The last 2 days have been crazy, 28 and a 24 today. But thats not the story 3 of us for sure caught today alone 100+ fish. The 20 to 23" fish is crazy.. The females have arrived, water temp is 50deg on the lake and the flow is excellent. We were sitting on an anchor but boats pulling plugs were netting fish all day long. The bite did not stop, 3/8 white glow with salted and live.
good to hear laurent thinking of heading up next sunday manitoba .... a 100,000 lakes how many walleyes ???? i will never have enough time....
see you thurs day new boat in tow
Hope u bought a Ranger Chris lol.Did u go with the verado or the opti?

I've been fishing Pine Falls for 20+ years and I've never seen a bite like this. We have not caught a master but the 19"-22" fish bite is unbelievable. And the potato wedge's at Clark's Corner are delicious.
